title: Eagle Ride
description: Eagle Ride is a very challenging flying game in which you ride on a fast-flying eagle and need to avoid the trees. Thankfully it is a bright day with only a little bit of fog, so you can see very clearly. The eagle's flying speed is very high and you need to swiftly avoid the trees. If you hit one, you can always restart and try again. What is the longest time you can fly without crashing? Good luck!
